reviewText: I SAW THIS DVD IN NETFLIX.  THIS SERIES IS SO GOOD THAT I WANT NEVER FINISH.THE LOVE BETWEEN HIM AND HER IS BEAUTIFUL.TODAY YOU DO NOT SEE THAT KIND THE MOVIES ANYMORE.THE FAMILY IS SO IMP0RTANT,THE DRAMA IS SO GOOD THAT YOU NEVER REALIZED THAT PEOPLE CAN DO ANYTHING TO LIE TO DESTROY FAMILY FOR MONEY OR POWER.I LIKE THE CHEMISTRY BETWEEN HIM AND HER.THE IMPORTANT THING IS DO NOT HAVE SEX YOU SEE LOVE,TENDERNES AND YOU NEVER REALIZED THAT ENDING.WAS THE BEST PART IN THE MOVIE.  leticia perez sanchez miami florida my congratulation to people and writer in TURKEY

the dvd quality, the english subs, the shipping, this was all terrific.  And,
a little gift attached to the package.  This floored me.  Such a kind
gesture.  It was the first big turkish film to be shown in germany with
subtitles, not dubbed.  Great english subs, hi res picture.  thanks.
